newest.message:
== Breaking Changes ==
* Data files extension has been changed due to CDN restrictions that distributes our data files. EVEMon versions prior of 1.8.9 will not be able to get updates of future data files.
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi * Protag
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a crash bug when creating or updating an outlook calendar entry and the character name contains a (') character. * Fixed a crash bug when double-clicking on an "Unknown" skill in the required skills section in Items Browser. * Fixed a crash bug when after cancelling selections in any Column Settings window and try to reopen the window.
== Enhancements ==
* Switching to general Exception catching for special use cases with Darwine/Wine. Not a best practice but will resolve future issues. * Skill planner now does not add a dependency skill level if the dependent skill level is already trained. * Added OwnerID and CharacterAffiliation endpoints for API Tester. * Added PlanetaryColonies, PlanetaryPins, PlanetaryRoutes, and PlanetaryLinks endpoints to the API Tester.
== Misc ==
* Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better application.
